item.text: I wrote the former account, Theophilus, about all that Jesus began to do and teach

<st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> he was <st data-num="353">taken up</st> to heaven,<n id="1" /> after he had <st data-num="1781" class="">given orders</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> to the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> he had <st data-num="1586" class="">chosen</st>.

<st data-num="3739">To the same apostles</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st>, <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffering</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3936" class="">presented</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5039" class="">convincing proofs</st>. He was <st data-num="3700" class="">seen</st> by <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> over a <st data-num="5062">forty</st>-<st data-num="2250">day</st> period<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> about <st data-num="3588">matters</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>.<n id="4" />

While he <st data-num="4871">was with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3853" class="">declared</st>,<n id="2" /> “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5563" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4037" class="">wait</st> there<n id="4" /> for what my<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> about from <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="7" />
For John baptized with water, but you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit not many days from now.”
So when they had gathered together, they began to ask him, “Lord, is this the time when you are restoring the kingdom to Israel?”

He <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> permitted to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5550" class="">times</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">periods</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> has <st data-num="5087">set by</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> you will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> when the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> has <st data-num="1904" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">upon</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4540" class="">Samaria</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2078">farthest parts</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.”

After<n id="1" /> he had <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, while <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="991" class="">watching</st>, he was <st data-num="1869">lifted up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st> <st data-num="5274" class="">hid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">sight</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">As</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> still <st data-num="816" class="">staring</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st> while <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="4198" class="">going</st>, <st data-num="2400" class="">suddenly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="2066" class="">clothing</st> <st data-num="3936">stood near</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>
and said, “Men of Galilee, why do you stand here looking up into the sky? This same Jesus who has been taken up from you into heaven will come back in the same way you saw him go into heaven.”
Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain called the Mount of Olives (which is near Jerusalem, a Sabbath day’s journey away).

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> Jerusalem,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="305" class="">went</st> to the <st data-num="5253">upstairs room</st> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2650" class="">staying</st>. <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st>, <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2381" class="">Thomas</st>, <st data-num="918" class="">Bartholomew</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3156" class="">Matthew</st>, <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> son of <st data-num="256" class="">Alphaeus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> the <st data-num="2207" class="">Zealot</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> son of <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> were there.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="4342">continued</st> <st data-num="3661" class="">together</st> in <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="3661">with one mind</st>, <st data-num="3661" class="">together</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">along</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> the <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="80">brothers</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="450">stood up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">believers</st><n id="2" /> (a <st data-num="3793" class="">gathering</st> of <st data-num="5616">about</st> <st data-num="1540 1501" class="">120</st> <st data-num="3686">people</st>) and <st data-num="3004">said</st>,

“<st data-num="80" class="">Brothers</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> <st data-num="1163">had to be</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st> that the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="4275">foretold</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st>—who <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> the <st data-num="3595" class="">guide</st> for those who <st data-num="4815" class="">arrested</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>—

<st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2674" class="">counted</st> as one of <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2975" class="">received</st> a <st data-num="2819" class="">share</st> in <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>.”<n id="1" />

(<st data-num="3767">Now</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> Judas<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2932" class="">acquired</st> a <st data-num="5564" class="">field</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st> of his <st data-num="93">unjust deed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">falling</st> <st data-num="4248" class="">headfirst</st><n id="3" /> he <st data-num="2997">burst open</st> in the <st data-num="3319" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4698" class="">intestines</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1632">gushed out</st>.
This became known to all who lived in Jerusalem, so that in their own language they called that field Hakeldama, that is, “Field of Blood.”)
“For it is written in the book of Psalms, ‘Let his house become deserted, and let there be no one to live in it,’ and ‘Let another take his position of responsibility.’

<st data-num="3767" class="">Thus</st> one of the <st data-num="435" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> who have <st data-num="4905" class="">accompanied</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1525 1831">associated</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">with</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,

<st data-num="757">beginning</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> by <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> he<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="353">taken up</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>—<st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> must <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> <st data-num="4862">together with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">proposed</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> candidates:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="2564">called</st> <st data-num="923" class="">Barsabbas</st> (also <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2459" class="">Justus)</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3159" class="">Matthias</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2589">know the hearts</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>. <st data-num="322" class="">Show</st> us <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> you have <st data-num="1586" class="">chosen</st>

to <st data-num="2983" class="">assume</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">task</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">service</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="651" class="">apostleship</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="3845">turned aside</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>.”<n id="4" />
Then they cast lots for them, and the one chosen was Matthias; so he was counted with the eleven apostles.
